Tenten repeatedly hits her opponent with a pair of [[Wikipedia:Tonfa|tonfa]], then strikes them into the air with a [[Wikipedia:Three-section staff|three-section staff]] which she separates to deliver a final blow to the falling opponent.

[[pt-br:Corte das Andorinhas Gêmeas]]
